items.content_html: A lightweight, type-safe utility for Next.js server & client actions with built-in auth, RBAC, Zod validation, auto retries, and real-time toast feedback. Just write your DB logic & zod schema, for your server action, we handle validation, auth, errors, retries & UI feedback seamlessly out of the box. No extra code, just focus on your logic! üöÄ
